title: How do I get a FREE criminal background check on myself?
text:
This previous post should answer your question:
http://www.myreporter.com/?p=3130



Also, the FBI does background checks, but for an $18 fee (not
including local fees for fingerprinting). Here's a link:
http://www.fbi.gov/about-us/cjis/background-checks/background_checks
